Name: Calm Mind
Effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage each.

Name: Close Combat
Effect: Decreases the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage each.

Name: Dragon Dance
Effect: Raises the user's Speed and Attack by 1 stage each.

Name: Facade
Effect: Doubles power if under a status effect

Name: Meteor Mash
Effect: 20% chance to raise user's Attack by 1 stage.

Name: Protect
Effect: Protects the user from any damage.

Name: Rest
Effect: User go to sleep for 2 turns and fully restore

Name: Rock Slide
Effect: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Shell Smash
Effect: Decrease Def and SpD by 1 stage and increases Atk and SpA by 2 stages.

Name: Sleep Talk
Effect: User uses 1 move randomly except this move when asleep.

Name: Toxic
Effect: Inflicts badly poison status on target.
